@allanwhite @NadiehBremer You mean the format you've used in a _redirects file instead of in the netlify.toml? This rule should totally work regardless of if you set it in a _redirects file or via netlify.toml, but in the toml, it would have to be expressed in valid toml format. https://t.co/fswopGFwke
